pages.text: Tools are what makes TechReborn so fun. No more tool breaking or conserving with a sliver, instead your tools just run out of energy! All tools can be charged in the battery box (and its higher tier relatives). Tools can be enchanted as well.
Works like an iron pickaxe and iron shovel in one!
Works like a faster iron pickaxe, but only on non-ore blocks!
Like an iron pickaxe, but with built-in Silk Touch!
Works like an iron axe, but has attack stats of diamond one!
The electric version of the tree tap!
